html:
4.21.17  7:41 am   how do you talk to yourself without inducing psychosis

     record it, and archive it, with plans to edit into an autobiographical series later

4.21.17  5:56 am   How will I be able to identify the new video if I don't know what it will be titled?

     it will be the one that's 19 minutes long

4.21.17  5:43 am   What is your view on postmodernism?

     that term seems a little deceptive

4.21.17  4:29 am   how to I appreciate the time that I have?

     explore, and try new things

4.21.17  3:22 am   are you aware you exist?

     yes

4.21.17  3:21 am   BIll you fill my life with joy how do Irepay you

     you could use money but if you can't that's ok

4.21.17  2:35 am   omg i just discovered the thing with the thing in it you are so cool thank you <3

     you're welcome
4.21.17  2:23 am   Did you ever write a question here just so you could just answer it on this website? And if so, what was it?

4.21.17  2:21 am   So um... how much time does it take to make a video?

     it depends on the video

     It's been 9 months already since you made a video...

     that's not true, i've been making a video the entire time

      I kinda miss you... Have a good night!

4.21.17  2:06 am   Would you consider making your "bedtime story" response into a video? I know the length suggests it should go on Vine which you don't do anymore, but I can absolutely hear your bedtime story as a jingle in my head... Related question, do you hear some of the responses you post here as jingles in your head sometimes?

     no. except for the ones that are already jingles in the video i'm working on

4.21.17  1:56 am   do you agree with the phrase AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAaAAaAaAaAaAaAaA

     yes

4.21.17  1:04 am   What are some cool things about life?

     i am trying to explain

4.21.17  12:42 am   The bass line in "you're free to do whatever you want to" is one of the best I've ever heard. How much of the exact notes were improvised and how much were written/rehearsed?

     i think in the music video, the chart is shown at the end. the chart encompases what was 'written' and all else that you hear would be decisions made during the recording process

4.20.17  11:45 pm   i want to change but i'm too scared

     ok

4.20.17  11:42 pm   what is the origin of mankind?

     some apes had some serious breakthroughs which almost immediately led to rocket science

4.20.17  11:42 pm   is this the last question?

     no

4.20.17  11:42 pm   are there going to be more questions?

     yes

4.20.17  11:42 pm   how many questions are there?

     at least 4

4.20.17  11:27 pm   Is carboard funny?

     nothing is funny

4.20.17  11:20 pm   what made u want to document so much of what u do online on ur website?

     so that it is available, to people like you

4.20.17  10:50 pm   do you think you've helped anybody through depression or suicidal thoughts or anything of the sort?

     yes

      if so, how do you feel about that?

     good

4.20.17  10:31 pm   sometimes i think things and then i tell myself to stop thinking that but then i think it even harder. how do i not do this?

     find other things to think, instead
4.20.17  10:07 pm   are you still living

4.20.17  10:03 pm   why do you tend to use the days of the week so often in your songs?

     i'm not sure. but common and familiar words and concepts usually go very well in songs, i think

4.20.17  10:02 pm   do u identify as a trans-pineapple

     no

4.20.17  9:57 pm   the world is so complex and somehow also so simple how do i wrap my head around it

     enjoy the ride

4.20.17  9:53 pm   how do i avoid going crazy

     develop a firm understanding of business
4.20.17  9:50 pm   Do you get tired of answering questions?

4.20.17  9:48 pm   Can you answer a question seriously?

     sure

4.20.17  9:48 pm   Can you ask any question seriously?

     sure

4.20.17  9:40 pm   y no youtube?

     i just checked, youtube is still there, right at youtube dot com, where it normally is

4.20.17  9:32 pm   When and why did you decide to stop wasting time? Or did it happen naturally?

     the main reason to stop wasting time was because i am not going to live forever, and i have a seemingly infinite amount of things that i desperately want to express. the realization has occured very steadily and gradually throughout my life
4.20.17  9:29 pm   any idea on possible new video release date? or an approximation?

4.20.17  9:26 pm   If you could liken Your upcoming to any of your already existing videos which one would it be?

     it is like history of japan in 2 ways, 1 because it's similar to history of japan, and 2 because it is different and larger than history of japan, which makes it similar to history of japan in the sense that it is a significant escalation from what came before. i hope that makes sense

4.20.17  9:22 pm   is there a time of day you normally check the questions page?

     no

4.20.17  9:22 pm   Is this question good enough?

     for what

4.20.17  9:22 pm   is there a list of all the green hyperlinks?

     maybe

4.20.17  9:15 pm   how can i not be unmotivated

     to do what

4.20.17  8:16 pm   u fell down any good holes?

     rabbit

4.20.17  8:07 pm   so i'm making a portrait of bill wurtz, how do i capture what why how who bill wurtz is

     i've been trying to do that on this site for quite some time now

4.20.17  8:03 pm   Have you ever been given a set of linearly independent vectors by your pet and thought to yourself, "I should totally orthonormalise these vectors to create a dimensional plane using the Gran-Schmidt process"

     no

4.20.17  8:01 pm   what time is it in the AEST time zone?

      it was 10:01 am at the time you asked this, it is 12:27 pm at the time i am answering it, and probably a different, later time as you are reading it

4.20.17  7:48 pm   how do you feel about nuclear war?

     seems counter productive

4.20.17  7:41 pm   can I change who I am?

     you will have to try and see

4.20.17  7:05 pm   I've taken a leaf from your book and started using phrases like "I'm sorry for the confusion" and "I disagree but I respect your opinion" and I feel a lot better about what I have to say. What else can I say to help me respectfully stand my ground?

     it depends on the situation

4.20.17  6:30 pm   what are your thoughts on maple syrup

     i haven't thought about it that much

4.20.17  6:09 pm   why dont you just exist harder

     i have already set the dial to max

4.20.17  4:58 pm   pros: updog is a fake word you can use to make your friends say "what's up, dog?" by accident cons: updog is not a real word

     i would say it is actually an advantage that it's not a real word. because that helps to ensure the proper response

4.20.17  4:56 pm   Do you give yourself pep talks?

     yes, but i like to think of it as more of a discussion

4.20.17  4:54 pm   yo, are you a work in progress

     oh hell yeah
